column4: Latest;Phnom Penh: Boeung Keng Kang District Police Inspectorate
column5: in cooperation with the Forestry Administration’s Wildlife Crime Intervention Team
column8: cracked down on endangered wildlife specimens at a sculpture shop in Boeung Keng Kang district.------The crackdown was carried out with a permit No. 125 BNN dated 16 July 2020 by Deputy Prosecutor Seng Heang

column10: appointing Mr. Kan Vivak as a clerk of the Phnom Penh Municipal Court Phnom Penh.------The crackdown on endangered wildlife specimens was led by Mr. Heng Kim Chhay
column11: Head of the Wildlife Crime Intervention Team of the Forestry Administration and the Phnom Penh Forestry Administration.The above location is branded as “Preah Me Neak Sculptor”
column18: Phnom Penh.------Captured evidence included 8 ivory specimens equal to 0.590 kg
